channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole in road, 22nd July
item.description:
In front of 11 Pittville Lawn. Hardcore is loose, posing a rush to vehicles and a trip hazard to pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Pittville Lawn, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large black plastic parasol base left on pavement, 22nd July
item.description:
On Beni Close, down the side of 52 Symphony Road and close to the side gate of that property. This item has been there for over 6 weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Symphony Road, Badgeworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kerb between service strip and Gardenia Grove collapsing into road, 22nd July
item.description:
The service strip between driveway and road outside 8 Gardenia Grove, GL51 3HR. It was repaired soon after we moved in but has got progressively worse in recent years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Gardenia Grove, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown vegitation impacting boundary fence, 22nd July
item.description:
Fence that runs along boundary of 1 centaur mews. Vegitation is grossly overgrown and has never been cut back or maintained and is now growing through and over our fence. Putting uneseccary pressure on the fence. Needs cutting back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cantors Drive, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path/Way doesn't match map problem, 22nd July
item.description:
Definitive alignment through overgrown area of trees, as opposed to established track to N
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstruction caused by wall/building problem, 22nd July
item.description:

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 22nd July
item.description:
Customer reported trees over hanging property. Tree roots are lifting the pavement. Customer thinks tree is causing subsidence to his house and lifting the paving outside his front door

item.title: Path/Way doesn't match map problem, 22nd July
item.description:
Definitive alignment on SW side of wall - heavily overgrown through former quarry workings (photos 1-3). 'Private' sign on gate at NW extent (photo 4). Waymarked route stays on NE side of wall in field - does not cross wall.

item.title: Obstruction caused by wall/building problem, 22nd July
item.description:
Definitive alignment obstructed by fencing around covered reservoir. Alternative route around in field

item.title: High grasss from bus shelter to 50 metres towards Cirencester instructing view when leaving Coberley, 22nd July
item.description:
There was another r huge accident at Coberley turning this weekend as a result of the grass still not being cut. Some has been cut around the bus shelter but it needs about 30-50 metres to be cut towards Cirencester. Drivers leaving Coberley CANNOT SEE cars approaching from Cirencester due to the high grass. 2 ACCIDENTS and all I get told is that’s it’s been done . It HAS NOT! In a car you cannot see towards Cirencester safely. In a van or 4x4 you can see somewhat better but you cannot in a car. I have written 4 times about this. Please ,please don’t let someone be killed when the grass could be cut in minutes. Please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 22nd July
item.description:
Trees growing over the alley way into the nursery. Trees from St Gregory's are growing into the alleyway and obscuring the light from the lamp post in the alley way.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ash Tree located on Highway land problem, 22nd July
item.description:
Check if GH, if so advise removals.Major bark damage. Evidence of 3 previous impacts.

item.title: Rattling fire hydrant, 22nd July
item.description:
Although this issue was reported as closed (29 April) the noise from the rattling fire hydrant is very irritating for residents, especially in the warmer weather when people leave their windows open.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, Greatfield Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 22nd July
item.description:
2 hr with give an take make safe damaged missing bollard 300x300x150mm temporary tarmac patch required (Damaged Bollard)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Curbs need weeding badly, 22nd July
item.description:
Tewkesbury council say it’s your responsibility to weed tge curbs, these haven’t been done for a very long time and makes the estate looks awful, one area has brambles starting to grow and pushing the curb away, please can this be dealt with. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
